text: Bug can mean many different things: ;Biology *True bug, a group of insects *Bug, a slang word for a pathogen that makes organisms ill *Bug, a slang word for an insect, such as an ant or a beetle ;Technology *Software bug, a problem with the code in a computer program *Bug, a device for telephone tapping *Bug, a nickname for a Volkswagen Beetle because of its shape ;Other *Western Bug and Southern Bug, two rivers in Poland and Ukraine *Something that irritates somebody, such as "My loud neighbour really bugs me!"
title: Bug
